title: Regular Expressions
description: Are you utilizing Regex in your application?
tags: WebApp, API, MessageServer, iOS, Android, Electron, WindowsPhone

General: We are utilizing a built-in library to do data validation, instead of regex (e.g. url parsing)
We have taken every step available to avoid utilizing user-provided regular expressions

We have taken steps to ensure that there are no [denial-of-service scenarios](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Regular_expression_Denial_of_Service_-_ReDoS) since we are dealing with user-provided input for regular expressions (e.g. limiting the character set of allowed characters, length of pattern)
We are under no circumstances utilizing PHP's `/e` regex modifier to execute code
We are not allowing any user input to the first parameter of preg_replace without ensuring that we completely control the modifier clause at the end of the regex
